column1: Little Goat Diner////Was in Chicago visiting and so excited to be able to make it to Little Goat on a Monday for lunch
column2: when the crowd was lighter. I made a reservation for my boyfriend and I and I'm so glad I did because even on a Monday afternoon this place filled up quickly.  We split the Sloppy Goat (our favorite of all the items we tried)
column5: and fries.  Reason for the 4 rating was only because though I liked the salad it was a bit greasy from the falafel
column8: wasn't our favorite.  It was a cool atmosphere and was fun finally checking out a Stephanie Izard restaurant.
